mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.password AS "password", a.true_name AS "trueName", a.login_key AS "loginKey", a.member_type AS "memberType", a.balance AS "balance", a.with_draw AS "withDraw", a.photo AS "photo", a.email AS "email", a.tel AS "tel", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.login_ip AS "loginIp", a.login_date AS "loginDate", a.login_flag AS "loginFlag", a.sort AS "sort", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
